Text.Page:
We're having a real problem with the vulcan intruders. They're devastating the forest and inflicting significant casualties. Hunt down the {@LinkCreature:29#4041#vulcan dreadnaughts} and bring back proof of death.

Report to Deirin when mission is complete. Dismissed!
Your hard work and suffering are appreciated. Accept this bounty with our thanks.
Without proof of death, bounty payments aren't authorized.
